description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Reporting to the Technical Support Manager, Medical Business Group, the Technical Support Engineer is responsible for installation, PM, troubleshooting, repair equipment; service tools and spare part inventory management; spare part and service contract selling. Support technical for demo, event in cooperative with sales team. Prepare technical document for equipment and others requirement for team objective achievement.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Education
              
              -	Diploma in Biomedical or Electrical Engineering
              
              Experience
              
              -	At least 3 years' experience in Medical Equipment technical support, computer and IT knowledge (PC re-pair and basic networking)
              
              -	Must possess excellent team work and interpersonal skills with a strong emphasis on good analytical skills
              
              -	Possess good customer interactions skills
              
              Other skills
              
              -	Must have knowledge in computer hardware, operating system and disk backup software, IT and networking
              
              -	Sound ability to troubleshoot and repair PC
              
              -	Good communication skills
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive salary and bonus
               







                Opportunities to be trained in the professional environment to maximize your potential
               







                Regular team building and social events
